'''Aranwë''' ([[Quenya|Q]], pron. {{IPA|[aˈranwe]}} was an [[Noldor|Elf]] of the [[House of Fingolfin]].

It is possible that he was a nobleman of [[Gondolin]], because of the meaning of his name and because his son [[Voronwë]] came from Gondolin.<ref name="Tuor">{{UT|Tuor}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Aranwë'' is a [[Quenya]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it means "King-person" and is a compound of ''[[aran]]'' ("king") and the (mainly masculine) name-suffix ''[[-wë]]'' ("man", "person").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1776237503.html|articlename=Q. ''Aranwë'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 September 2022}}</ref>
